name: Sonic Projector, Light, Modified (ModLtSpj_14)
description: Modified version of the light sonic projector. This weapon projects a sound-based effect at the target (as distinct from the sound some weapons make when firing).

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
